title: Gee, guess it is impossible to carry a game in bronze.
body:
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1655287952/212856744

Team never peels for me, team never focuses Draven/Orianna, team decides to continuously feed and not play safe because they're losing lane, team decides "Let's focus Shyvana," rather than the backline.

Just really, I'm like I'm Fiora, you need to peel for me because I'm ultra squishy and vulnerable to CC, yet here they are doing absolutely nothing.

I don't even know how you're supposed to carry a game like this.

Any tips?

Because I'm losing my mind trying to figure it out.
